price: 24. Tokkel Qhuraanak: ah tu hinna Mucammad naharsi marak baahe baab akke waytek iyye.
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faqāla in hādhā illā siḥ'run yu'tharu
